references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are central to the current paper's methodology and are extensively used in the experiments.
This paper proposes an alternative formulation of diffusion models, which is relevant to the method used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Dirichlet diffusion score model for biological sequence generation
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on the application of diffusion models to biological sequence generation, a key application domain of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Training diffusion models with reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper explores the use of reinforcement learning to fine-tune diffusion models, which directly informs the current paper's approach.

references.paper_title: DPOK: Reinforcement learning for fine-tuning text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper also utilizes reinforcement learning to fine-tune diffusion models, offering a relevant comparison and contrast to the current work's approach.
